p:
In a systematic review and meta‐analysis of 11 RCTs of R. rosea, Hung et al.
381 concluded that “the methodological quality of most trials was moderate or good. Five of the 11 RCTs reached more than 3 points on the Jadad score (i.e., good quality). R. rosea may have beneficial effects on physical performance, mental performance, and certain mental health conditions. Only a few mild adverse events were reported. There is, however, a lack of independent replications of the single different studies”.
